 ******************************************************************************************************************** */import sanitizeHtmlString from'sanitize-html';const sanitizeHtml=data=>{if(data){if(Array.isArray(data)){return data.map(d=>sanitizeHtml(d));}else if(typeof data==='string'){return sanitizeHtmlString(data,{allowedTags:[]});}else if(typeof data==='object'){return Object.keys(data).reduce((attrs,key)=>({...attrs,[key]:sanitizeHtml(data[key])}),{});}}return data;};export default sanitizeHtml;
